actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend part D of title IV of the Social Security Act to prohibit the retroactive modification of child support arrearages.

summary.text: Amends part D (Child Support) of title IV of the Social Security Act to prohibit the retroactive modification of child support arrearages except with respect to such arrearages which accumulate after the obligee and entity which issued the child support order receive notice that the obligor has pending an active application for modification of such order.

titles.title: A bill to amend part D of title IV of the Social Security Act to prohibit the retroactive modification of child support arrearages.
